members.member:
Draws barcode on specified page of PDF document.
Stream containing input PDF document. Zero-based page index. Use -1 to draw barcode on each document page. X coordinate (in document units). Y coordinate (in document units). ///outputStream.

member.name: M:Bytescout.BarCode.WPF.BarcodeControl.DrawToPDF(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Draws barcode on specified page of PDF document.
member.param: Input PDF file name.
Zero-based page index. Use -1 to draw barcode on each document page.
X coordinate (in document units).
Y coordinate (in document units).
Output pdfFileName

member.name: M:Bytescout.BarCode.WPF.BarcodeControl.FitInto(System.Single,System.Single,Bytescout.BarCode.UnitOfMeasure)
member.summary: Fits the barcode into the area of size specified in units. Calling this method will change output size of the barcode. Barcode size will be increased in order to occupy all of the area.
member.param: The width of the area in specified units.
The height of the area in specified units.
The unit of measure for area size.

member.name: M:Bytescout.BarCode.WPF.BarcodeControl.FitInto(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Fits the barcode into the area of size specified in pixels. Calling this method will change output size of the barcode. Barcode size will be increased in order to occupy all of the area.
member.param: The width of the area.
The height of the area.

member.name: M:Bytescout.BarCode.WPF.BarcodeControl.FitInto(System.Windows.Size)
member.summary: Fits the barcode into the area of size specified in pixels. Calling this method will change output size of the barcode. Barcode size will be increased in order to occupy all of the area.
member.param: The size of the area to fit the barcode into.

member.name: M:Bytescout.BarCode.WPF.BarcodeControl.FitInto(System.Windows.Size,Bytescout.BarCode.UnitOfMeasure)
member.summary: Fits the barcode into the area of size specified in units. Calling this method will change output size of the barcode. Barcode size will be increased in order to occupy all of the area.
member.param: The size of the area to fit the barcode into.
The unit of the size.

member.name: M:Bytescout.BarCode.WPF.BarcodeControl.SetAdditionalCaptionFont(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Byte)
member.summary: Sets the font with specified properties as the barcode additional caption font.
member.param: The family name of the font.
The size of the font in pixels.
If true, then the text drawn with the font will be bold.
If true, then the text drawn with the font will be italic.
If true, then the text drawn with the font will be underlined.
If true, then the text drawn with the font will be contain line through the middle.
A GDI character set to use for this font.

member.name: M:Bytescout.BarCode.WPF.BarcodeControl.SetAdditionalCaptionFont(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the font with specified properties as the barcode additional caption font.
member.param: The family name of the font.
The size of the font in pixels.
